mainHero.title: Your  Vision,
mainHero.subtitle: Our Expertise.
mainHero.description: Lbitm Company was established in Baghdad under Company Law No. 21 of 1997 to support Iraq’s urban development. Combining expertise, financial strength, and technical capabilities, it has become a leading firm in construction, roads, and infrastructure. With a capital of 5 billion Iraqi dinars, it is classified as a first-class construction and fifth-class electrical company. Backed by over 15 years of experience, Lbitm’s team of engineers, technicians,

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Construction of External Fence and Earthworks at Al-Aziziyah Power Station
items.description: Execution of external fencing and earthwork elevation at Al-Aziziyah Power Station. This project was undertaken to enhance infrastructure security and stability, ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices.

items.title: Design and Supervision of Abi Al-Khasib Hospital
items.description: A collaborative project with Al-Ansab Company for the design and supervision of Abi Al-Khasib Hospital. The project aimed to enhance medical infrastructure, ensuring high-quality healthcare standards.

items.title: Rehabilitation and Construction of Al-Ahiba School in Dhi Qar
items.description: The project involved the rehabilitation and execution of Al-Ahiba School in Dhi Qar Governorate, enhancing educational infrastructure to meet modern standards.

items.title: Rehabilitation of Agricultural Building (Constitutional Court) in the Green Zone
items.description: A partnership with Manar Dijla Company to rehabilitate the agricultural building in the Green Zone, ensuring modern standards and infrastructure improvements.

items.title: Rehabilitation of Heavy Water Network in Camp Taji - Phase 4
items.description: A partnership with Al-Iraq Al-Moasir and Washington Companies to enhance the heavy water network in Camp Taji, improving wastewater management.

items.title: Installation of BRC Fence, 60 km in Camp Taji
items.description: The installation of a 60 km BRC fence in Camp Taji to enhance security and structural integrity.

items.title: Restoration and Rehabilitation of Schools in Al-Khadraa Neighborhood
items.description: Rehabilitation of Um Al-Qura, Administration, and Marooj Schools in Al-Khadraa, improving the educational environment for students.

items.title: Paving of Streets in Sumer Neighborhood, Al-Mada'in
items.description: Execution of street paving in the Sumer neighborhood, enhancing road infrastructure and connectivity.

items.title: Earthworks and Gravel Filling in Al-Wardi Area, Al-Mada'in
items.description: Carried out earthworks and gravel filling in Al-Wardi area to enhance land stability and roadbed preparation.

items.title: Expansion of Baghdad-Kut Road (12 km)
items.description: Expansion and improvement of a 12 km section of the Baghdad-Kut road to facilitate transportation and road efficiency.

items.title: Rehabilitation and Construction of Second Floor in the Medical Committees Building, Bab Al-Muazzam
items.description: Enhancement of the Medical Committees Building, including the addition of a second floor to accommodate growing healthcare needs.

items.title: Paving of Main Branches of Nine Nissan Center in Nahiyat Al-Wahda
items.description: Infrastructure improvements in Nahiyat Al-Wahda, focusing on road paving and urban development.

items.title: Rehabilitation of Al-Zubaidiya School in Al-Zubaidiya
items.description: Rehabilitation project for Al-Zubaidiya School to improve the learning environment for students.

items.title: Paving of Al-Khamasiya Street and Al-Jame'a Street in Nahiyat Al-Wahda
items.description: Execution of paving works in Al-Khamasiya and Al-Jame'a streets, improving transportation infrastructure.

items.title: Paving and Infrastructure Work in Various Areas
items.description: Various projects executed for urban and infrastructure development, ensuring sustainable progress.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the Future of Iraq
about.description: Lbitm was established in 1997 in Baghdad under Company Law No. 21 to support Iraq’s urban development. With a capital of 5 billion IQD, the company is classified as First-Class in Construction and Fifth-Class in Electrical Engineering. Over the past 15+ years, we have built a strong reputation for delivering infrastructure and construction projects across Iraq, serving both public and private sectors. Our company brings together technical expertise, financial capability, and engineering excellence, ensuring high-quality execution in roads, infrastructure, and large-scale civil projects.

equipment.name: Excavator
equipment.description: Heavy-duty excavator used for site preparation.

equipment.name: Bulldozer
equipment.description: Used for land clearing and leveling.
